trans-unit.source: Calibrate sensors
trans-unit.target: Calibrate sensors

trans-unit.source: Sensors in a device based on the magnetometer – the compass, inclinometer and orientation sensor - can become in need of calibration due to environmental factors.
trans-unit.target: Sensors in a device based on the magnetometer – the compass, inclinometer and orientation sensor - can become in need of calibration due to environmental factors.

trans-unit.source: Calibrate sensors
trans-unit.target: Calibrate sensors

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: Important APIs
trans-unit.target: Important APIs

trans-unit.source: Windows.Devices.Sensors
trans-unit.target: Windows.Devices.Sensors

trans-unit.source: Windows.Devices.Sensors.Custom
trans-unit.target: Windows.Devices.Sensors.Custom

trans-unit.source: Sensors in a device based on the magnetometer – the compass, inclinometer and orientation sensor - can become in need of calibration due to environmental factors.
trans-unit.target: Sensors in a device based on the magnetometer – the compass, inclinometer and orientation sensor - can become in need of calibration due to environmental factors.

trans-unit.source: The [**MagnetometerAccuracy**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297552) enumeration can help determine a course of action when your device is in need of calibration.
trans-unit.target: The [**MagnetometerAccuracy**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297552) enumeration can help determine a course of action when your device is in need of calibration.

trans-unit.source: When to calibrate the magnetometer
trans-unit.target: When to calibrate the magnetometer

trans-unit.source: The [**MagnetometerAccuracy**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297552) enumeration has four values that help you determine if the device your app is running on needs to be calibrated.
trans-unit.target: The [**MagnetometerAccuracy**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297552) enumeration has four values that help you determine if the device your app is running on needs to be calibrated.

trans-unit.source: If a device needs to be calibrated, you should let the user know that calibration is needed.
trans-unit.target: If a device needs to be calibrated, you should let the user know that calibration is needed.

trans-unit.source: However, you should not prompt the user to calibrate too frequently.
trans-unit.target: However, you should not prompt the user to calibrate too frequently.

trans-unit.source: We recommend no more than once every 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: We recommend no more than once every 10 minutes.

trans-unit.source: | Value | Description |-----------------|-------------------| | **Unknown** | The sensor driver could not report the current accuracy.
trans-unit.target: | Value | Description |-----------------|-------------------| | **Unknown** | The sensor driver could not report the current accuracy.

trans-unit.source: This does not necessarily mean the device is out of calibration.
trans-unit.target: This does not necessarily mean the device is out of calibration.

trans-unit.source: It is up to your app to decide the best course of action if **Unknown** is returned.
trans-unit.target: It is up to your app to decide the best course of action if **Unknown** is returned.

trans-unit.source: If your app is dependant on an accurate sensor reading, you may want to prompt the user to calibrate the device.
trans-unit.target: If your app is dependant on an accurate sensor reading, you may want to prompt the user to calibrate the device.

trans-unit.source: | | **Unreliable** | There is currently a high degree of inaccuracy in the magnetometer.
trans-unit.target: | | **Unreliable** | There is currently a high degree of inaccuracy in the magnetometer.

trans-unit.source: Apps should always ask for a calibration from the user when this value is first returned.
trans-unit.target: Apps should always ask for a calibration from the user when this value is first returned.

trans-unit.source: | | **Approximate** | The data is accurate enough for some applications.
trans-unit.target: | | **Approximate** | The data is accurate enough for some applications.

trans-unit.source: A virtual reality app, that only needs to know if the user has moved the device up/down or left/right, can continue without calibration.
trans-unit.target: A virtual reality app, that only needs to know if the user has moved the device up/down or left/right, can continue without calibration.

trans-unit.source: Apps that need an absolute heading, like a navigation app that needs to know what direction you are driving in order to give you directions, need to ask for calibration.
trans-unit.target: Apps that need an absolute heading, like a navigation app that needs to know what direction you are driving in order to give you directions, need to ask for calibration.

trans-unit.source: | | **High** | The data is precise.
trans-unit.target: | | **High** | The data is precise.

trans-unit.source: No calibration is needed, even for apps that need to know an absolute heading such as augmented reality or navigation apps.
trans-unit.target: No calibration is needed, even for apps that need to know an absolute heading such as augmented reality or navigation apps.

trans-unit.source: How to calibrate the magnetometer
trans-unit.target: How to calibrate the magnetometer

trans-unit.source: This short video gives an overview of how to calibrate the magnetometer.
trans-unit.target: This short video gives an overview of how to calibrate the magnetometer.
